procedures.name: Chest X-ray
procedures.label: Chest X-ray
procedures.description: Chest x-ray posterior-anterior view, interpreted and reported by radiologist or pulmonologist. Lateral view may also be taken. Locally performed.

procedures.name: Lipid Panel
procedures.label: Lipid Panel
procedures.description: Fasting lipid panel laboratory tests. Fasting samples are preferred, but if participant is non-fasting at time of collection, this is not a protocol deviation.

procedures.label: Urinalysis
procedures.description: Urinalysis laboratory test

procedures.label: Serum Pregnancy
procedures.description: Serum pregnancy test performed only for women of childbearing potential and women with a history of tubal ligation

medicalDevices.name: Electronic Patient Diary
medicalDevices.label: ePRO Diary
medicalDevices.description: Electronic patient diary for recording patient-reported outcomes including stool frequency, rectal bleeding, nocturnal stools, Bristol Stool Scale, urgency NRS, abdominal pain NRS, fatigue NRS, and Patient Global Rating of Severity
